text: Soon after his return from Europe, Clarence Paget had become seriously ill with a supposed abscess on the lungs. After months of suffering, his life was almost despaired of when as a last resort it was suggested that the patient should be taken to consult Hahnemann once again.
handwritten_text: Soon after his return from Europe, Clarence Paget had become seriously ill with a supposed abscess on the lungs. After months of suffering, his life was almost despaired of when as a last resort it was suggested that the patient should be taken to consult Hahnemann once again.
